source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: How To Draw The Entire Face
items.headline: Learn how to draw each individual part of the face and improve as an artist
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to draw each part of the face and the entire face with easy, comprehensive, step-by-step instructions.

items.title: Acrylic landscape painting , complete beginner guide
items.headline: Realistic landscape painting
objectives_summary: In this course , students will learn the tips and tricks to do realistic sky, trees, mountain, waterfalls , water reflection and waves in it and the rocks along with the basic colour theory.
Realistic landscape painting

items.title: Create Cocktail Art with Homemade Printmaking Techniques

visible_instructors.job_title: New York Times Bestselling Author & Artist
visible_instructors.title: Amy Stewart
visible_instructors.name: Amy

items.headline: Ink Your Drink with Image Transfers and Whimsical Watercolor
objectives_summary: How to trace an image with ink to make a print
How to easily transfer ink and create interesting designs on paper
How to use loose, vibrant watercolor to animate your prints

items.title: Create a Garden & Nature Sketchbook

visible_instructors.job_title: New York Times Bestselling Author & Artist
visible_instructors.title: Amy Stewart
visible_instructors.name: Amy

items.headline: Celebrate the Outdoors With Ink & Watercolor
objectives_summary: How to sketch a garden scene, leaf, or flower in pencil
How to use ink to add details
How to mix a range of greens to bring a garden scene to life

items.title: Left-Handed Crochet - Learn to Crochet in an evening.
items.headline: Basic Course For Left-Handed Crochet
objectives_summary: Left Handed Crochet
How to chose wool and crochet hooks
The basic crochet stiches

items.title: Winter 3 Watercolor Scenes For Beginners - Cardinal
items.headline: Step by Step Winter Trees, Holly Berries and then a more Advanced Red Cardinal. All three projects will use gouache.
objectives_summary: 3 projects - Holly Berries and Trees with snow, and a more advanced Red Cardinal Class.  All 3 are short and easy mini watercolor classes.
This class teaches you how to create layers, incorporate gouache into your watercolors, and utilize color in ways to effectively create layers to add depth.
This course is for all levels of watercolorist or crafty/creative folks looking to create. You will be able to achieve the look of snow.

items.title: Make your own Pet Portrait with Hand Embroidery
items.headline: Stitch a portrait of your own or someone else's dog for a great gift!
objectives_summary: How to make you own pet portrait with embroidery

items.title: Oil painting wildlife animals
items.headline: Full video of painting Realistic elephant
objectives_summary: How to paint a realistic elephant on canvas
How to paint elephant skin, elephant head, elephant trunk and tusk in detail
Realistic Wild life painting

items.title: Watercolour Painting Tutorial - Realistic Nuthatch Bird!
items.headline: Let me show you how to paint a realistic Nuthatch bird in watercolour. Learn to paint wood texture and fine details.
objectives_summary: Learn to paint this colourful Nuthatch bird, by following my step by step instructions and a range of watercolour techniques.
I will show you the whole process of painting this colourful bird using fine detailed watercolour techniques.
Learn how to paint realistic looking feathers

items.title: Learn to Fly - Private Pilot Maneuvers
items.headline: Learn the basics of flying an airplane in the comfort of your home!
objectives_summary: Learn to fly airplanes in a flight simulator based on real world procedures
All practical aspects of a real private pilot course
Flying lessons consisting of briefings and simulator flights

items.title: Paint some GRAPES, 3 colours, lots of water, gain CONFIDENCE

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A

items.headline: This course will REALLY build your confidence to paint without sketching, use a limited palette and LOTS of water.
objectives_summary: Use only three colours and a large brush
Learn how to visualize and paint the shape and the mass of your subject.
Learn to use the bleeds of the colours to advantage

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Red Grape - Still life

visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor
visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova
visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina

items.headline: Step by Step real-time Painting Tutorial! You will paint red grape with this lesson!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint flowers: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, detailing, glazing
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: Start painting landscape forest and deer
items.headline: Learn painting forest landscape, sun light in forest and a deer in oil or acrylic for beginner to intermediate
objectives_summary: How to paint a dense forest
How to paint sunlight and effect of light and shadow
Types of brushes which are used in this painting and their uses

items.title: One stroke painting/ A to Z complete guide
items.headline: Easy one stroke painting from basic to advanced level.
objectives_summary: Students will learn to do complete One stroke painting

items.title: Start Your Own Woodworking Business Today!

visible_instructors.job_title: Master Craftsman at Refined Edge Design. Author, Educator.
visible_instructors.title: Norman Pirollo
visible_instructors.name: Norman

items.headline: Learn how I started 4 successful woodworking businesses! How to turn your woodworking hobby into a woodworking business!
objectives_summary: Get information necessary to start your own woodworking business
Learn about marketing a woodworking business
Develop a style of furniture or wood product to sell

items.title: Learn how to paint Byzantine Icons (Part 3)
items.headline: Byzantine icons from scratch
objectives_summary: Learn how to paint icons from the beginning.
Learn how to paint in the byzantine style.
Recognise the byzantine painting style.
